name: QName

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: The URI, specified as a Namespace object, an existing QName object, or string.
parameters.longdesc:
If this is a Namespace object, the URI is set to the namespace URI, and there is no local name.
									
									If this is a QName object, the URI and localName is set to those of that object.
									If this is a string, the URI is set to that string.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The local name. Used only if URI is given as a string.

properties.name: uri
properties.description: The URI part of the qualified name.

properties.name: localName
properties.description: The local name part of the qualified name.

description: A qualified XML name, containing the URI and the local name.
